skills.title: Web Developer
skills.description:
Why I Love Web Development

I love web development because it allows me to create interactive and dynamic user experiences. There's something magical about turning ideas into functional websites that people can actually use and enjoy.

What Excites Me Most:
  • Building responsive and accessible user interfaces
  • Creating seamless user experiences
  • Solving complex problems with clean code
  • Staying updated with the latest web technologies
  • Collaborating with designers and other developers

skills.title: Editing & Motion Graphic
skills.description:
My Passion for Visual Storytelling

Motion graphics and video editing fascinate me because they combine creativity with technical skills. I enjoy bringing stories to life through visual effects and smooth animations.

What I Love About This Field:
  • Creating engaging visual narratives
  • Experimenting with creative transitions and effects
  • Synchronizing visuals with audio perfectly
  • Learning new animation techniques
  • Transforming raw footage into polished content

Currently im working towards my certifications in this area!

skills.title: Basic Machine Learning
skills.description:
Why I love AI/ML

Machine learning excites me because it's like teaching computers to think and learn patterns. I'm passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and create intelligent systems.

Areas I'm Exploring:
  • Data analysis and visualization
  • Predictive modeling and algorithms
  • Natural Language Processing basics
  • Computer vision fundamentals
  • Statistical analysis and interpretation
My Learning Journey:
  1. Started with Python fundamentals
  2. Learned data structures and algorithms
  3. Explored data visualization techniques
  4. Currently diving deeper into ML algorithms
